But if u do not like the product, You'll just have to tell her straight that u do not want to.For person who have closer relationship with : What I always do is that I will just buy 1 unit (if its not too ex) to 'try out'. Take it as helping her and also trying some supplements for yourself/parents, but after that u can just say u dont feel any difference so u'll not buy again.I dont mind spend a little to help others, as i do not know when I'll need their help too.
